posts.post_title: FT: nice T206 Johnson Portrait SGC 10
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jimi
Scans upon request.  Very nice SGC 10.  I would like to trade this card plus cash for a higher grade one, preferably SGC 30 or higher.  Willing to trade for other Johnsons, Mattys, Cobbs, Gehrigs, Ruths, etc., too.  Just seeing what's out there!

  

Jimi
